patthana15.68:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.68:0.3_0: heated to the bride of the skillful.
patthana15.68:1.1_0: Skillfulness arises dependent on the teaching and is not a cause.
patthana15.68:1.1_1: An undetermined teaching doesn’t arise for you.
patthana15.68:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana15.68:2.1_0: Unskillfulness doesn’t give rise to the unskillful.
patthana15.68:2.1_1: An undetermined teaching doesn’t arise for cause or reason.
patthana15.68:2.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana15.68:2.1_4: (All should be expanded as for the two reasons.)
